com.rattat.micro.game.aster
Class MenuCanvas

java.lang.Object
  Canvas
      com.rattat.micro.game.aster.MenuCanvas

public class MenuCanvas
extends Canvas

Canvas object for displaying options - new game, turn sound off etc

Author:
william@rattat.com
